2021-12-01.name: Given: Uragawa no Sonzai
2021-12-01.desc:
* Based on a BL music manga series by Kizu Natsuki.

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the 7th manga volume.

2021-12-01.name: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stone Ocean
2021-12-01.desc:
* Based on the sixth story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure manga series by Araki Hirohiko. The arc spanned 17 volumes total, consisting of volumes 64 through 80 of the overall manga, and was serialized in Weekly Shounen Jump from 1999 to 2003.

Florida, U.S.A, 2011. After an accident while on a drive with her sweetheart, Jolyne Cujoh falls into a trap and is sentenced to fifteen years. She is sent to the state-run maximum-security correctional facility Green Dolphin Street Prison—AKA "the Aquarium." On the verge of despair, she receives a pendant from her father that causes a mysterious power to awaken inside of her.

"There are things in this world that are more terrifying than death, and what's happening in this prison is definitely one of them."

A message from a mysterious boy who appears before Jolyne, inexplicable events that occur one after another, the horrifying truth told to her by her father when he comes to visit, and the name DIO... Will Jolyne ultimately be set free from this stone ocean they call a prison? The final battle to end century-long fateful confrontations between the Joestar family and DIO begins!!

Source: Official website

2021-12-03.name: Aria the Benedizione
2021-12-03.desc:
* Based on the fantasy slice of life manga series Aria by Amano Kozue.

A new animated film that revolves around the members of Himeya.

2021-12-03.name: Dawang Raoming
2021-12-03.desc:
The silent life shattered in the age of the resurgent spirit, as if thunder ran through the long sky, lightning shot straight to the heart of heaven, and rain fell in rustling. Whatever goes against us will eventually die, that is the law.
High school student Lu Shu changes his life in a car accident. When the era of aura recovery comes, he wants to be the leader of this era.
What goes around comes around, and the winner is the king.
This is the story of Lu Shu who relies on poisonous chicken soup to become a great demon king

source: baike.baidu.com/DeepL.com

2021-12-05.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Yuukaku Hen
2021-12-05.desc:
* Based on an action fantasy shounen manga by Gotouge Koyoharu.

Tanjirou and his comrades embark on a new mission within the Yoshiwara Entertainment District to face the demon Daki.

Source: Official twitter

2021-12-06.name: Kanashiki Debu Neko-chan
2021-12-06.desc:
The story centers on a cat named Maru, adopted by a girl named Anna from a shelter in Matsuyama city. Loved and well fed by the family, Maru gets rounder and fatter every day, spending most of his day sitting by the window and looking at the garden outside. When the family gets a new cat named Cerisier and begins doting on it, Maru gets jealous. In a fight with Cerisier, Maru is hurt by the family's words to him, and follows the advice of another cat to leave and see the world.

Source: ANN

2021-12-08.name: Shu Shan Qi Xian Lu
2021-12-08.desc:
During the Tang Dynasty, the border is in turmoil. Li Haobai, a young man from Shu, has his heart set on the journey to join the army at Hangu Pass with his young partner Hu Jian in order to realize his ambition; in the chaotic world, demons emerge. In the city of Chengdu, the old Taoist Free Spirit goes around subduing demons and eliminating them; while far away in Chang'an, the unsuspecting old Taoist Xun Guosi deceives the Emperor into cultivating immortality and uses his minions to capture "dragon beasts" indiscriminately " to cultivate an immortal elixir. Li Haobai, by chance, fuses with the "Lixi pearl" inside the dragon beast and becomes the target of all the people. Not only does Xun Guo Shi's men want to capture Li Haobai, but also people from all walks of life in the Jianghu River want to get the Lixi pearl to cultivate immortality. Li Haobai is rescued by a man who is passing by to remove the demons. He is warned that if he does not take out the Lixi pearl and return it to the Dragon Veins, Li Haobai will die within 30 days and the world will suffer a catastrophe due to the turbulence of the Dragon Veins. On their way to join the army at Hangu Pass, they meet a wandering girl from the West, Ahimu. During the journey, the four escape from the pursuit of Xun Guo Shi's men several times, and during the journey, Li Xiao Bai slowly merges with Li Hao Bai, who inadvertently transforms into a "black dragon". During the journey, a white dragon, symbolizing "yang", suddenly appears and pesters Li Haobai all the way. The mysterious white dragon leads the boy to leave Li Haobai and track down the white dragon to discover its secret. When the Lixi pearl is discovered, the news spreads around the world and Li Haobai, who is carrying the Lixi pearl, is hunted by strange people in the jungle.

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2021-12-16.name: Aggressive Retsuko (2021)
2021-12-16.desc:
Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work. After becoming an underground idol to pay off her debts, Retsuko decides to quit OTMGirls and enjoy living a happy, normal life... but just as the company she works for is facing big changes, her relationship with Haida finally begins to move.

Source: netflix

2021-12-23.name: Chikajou no Mamono
2021-12-23.desc:
A demon has emerged deep beneath Tokyo. The governor of Tokyo and his escort unit go to inspect but are trapped underground. Surrounded by darkness with nowhere to go, people lose their reason and become consumed by the demon.

Source: Official Stream

2021-12-24.name: Gekijouban Jujutsu Kaisen 0
2021-12-24.desc:
* Based on a dark fantasy shounen manga by Akutami Gege.

Okkotsu Yuuta is a nervous high school student who is suffering from a serious problem—his childhood friend Rika has turned into a Curse and won't leave him alone. Since Rika is no ordinary Curse, his plight is noticed by Gojou Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, a school where fledgling exorcists learn how to combat Curses. Gojou convinces Yuuta to enroll, but can he learn enough in time to confront the Curse that haunts him?

Source: Viz

2021-12-27.name: Xue Ying Lingzhu Di San Ji

2021-12-28.name: The Missing 8
2021-12-28.desc:
A devastated world ── Androids and robots live there. "Poppy" is an android that looks like a human. Android "Punkun" who is not interested in human. One night, a star fell in front of them looking up at the sky...

Source: Official YouTube channel

2021-12-31.name: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo: Rail Zeppelin Grace Note - Tokubetsu Hen
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Tsuioku Hen
2021-12-31.desc:
* Based on the light novel's eighth volume by the same name written by Satou Tsutomu and illustrated by Ishida Kana.

Looking at Miyuki and Tatsuya now, it might be hard to imagine them as anything other than loving siblings. But it wasn't always this way...

Three years ago, Miyuki was always uncomfortable around her older brother. The rest of their family treated him no better than a lowly servant, even though he was the perfect Guardian, watching over Miyuki while she lived a normal middle school life. But what really bothered her was that he never showed any emotions or thoughts of his own.

However, when danger comes calling during a fateful trip to Okinawa, their relationship as brother and sister will change forever...

Source: Yen Press

2021-12-31.name: Sorairo Utility
2021-12-31.desc:
Minami is a high school girl and beginner at golf. Her two friends Haruka and Ayaka introduce her to the sport and they enjoy playing and learning together.

Source: ANN
